term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - molar activity in radiochemistry
term.title: molar activity

item.text: For a specified isotope, the activity of the compound divided by the amount of the material in moles: Am = A/n.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 2513. 'Nomenclature for radioanalytical chemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 2515 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466122513)
